name: Shazam
description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com

api_methods.name: songs/get-count
api_methods.description: Get total times the specific song is detected/shazamed by using .../songs/detect or .../songs/v2/detect endpoint

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key field returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint

utterances.utterance: How many times has the song with key 40333609 been detected on Shazam?
Get the total Shazam count for the song identified by key 12345678.
Show me how many times the track with key 98765432 has been shazamed.
Tell me the total number of detections for the song key 55555555.
What is the detection count for the song with key 11223344 on Shazam?
Find out how many times the song identified by key 87654321 has been detected.
Retrieve the total Shazam detections for the song key 33445566.
How often has the song with key 99887766 been shazamed so far?
Get me the total number of times the track with key 44556677 has been detected on Shazam.
Check the total detection count for the song identified by key 66778899.
